category: Regulations on establishment and operation of advisory committee/Article 15 (International Committee)
contents: Article 15 (International Committee) ① The International Committee shall respond to the advice of the Chairman on the following matters. Revised 2019. 1. 31., 2023. 7. 5. 1. Matters related to sports diplomacy issues of the Sports Association 2. All matters related to domestic attraction of international sports competitions, international competitions and conferences for each event, etc. 3. Sports Association regarding the international sports world Developing public relations and sports diplomacy activities 4. Promoting and enhancing relationships with major international organizations and related parties in relation to the Olympic Movement 5. Measures to strengthen international sports exchanges by utilizing the network and expertise of international committee members 6. Other functions of the international committee ② The decision to host the international multi-sports event in the country under Paragraph 1, Item 2 shall be resolved with the approval of more than two-thirds of the members present. [Moved from Article 18, the previous Article 15 was Article 15. Moved to Article 16 2017. 4. 3.] [Fully revised 2017. 4. 3.]
